languages.text: "Спустя полгода у нас родилась двойня. Мальчик и девочка с глазами темнее самой тьмы". {n}Ксиони ласково улыбается Кибелле.{/n} "Ты родилась первой, Нааки. И мы со скорбью и гордостью отдали Висирю самое драгоценное сокровище. Ибо так надо чтить Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Спустя полгода у нас родилась двойня. Мальчик и девочка с глазами темнее звездного неба". {n}Ксиони Эрэбис ласково улыбается Кибелле.{/n} "Ты родилась первой, Нааки. И когда пришло время клану покидать флагман, мы с величайшим сожалением, но и с гордостью, передали свое самое драгоценное сокровище в руки Висиря — дабы свершилось то, что начертано".

languages.text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Спустя полгода у нас родилась двойня. Мальчик и девочка с глазами темнее самой тьмы". {n}Ксиони ласково улыбается Кибелле.{/n} "Ты родилась первой, Нааки. И мы со скорбью и гордостью отдали Висирю самое драгоценное сокровище. Ибо так надо чтить Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is the way to worship the Undying One."

"Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is the way to worship the Undying One."

"Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that how we worship the Undying One."

"Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that how we worship the Undying One."

"Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

"Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

languages.text: « Six mois plus tard, nous avons eu des jumeaux. Un garçon et une fille aux yeux plus sombres que les ténèbres elles-mêmes. » {n}Xioni adresse à Kibellah un sourire empreint de tendresse.{/n} « Tu es née la première, Naaki. Et c'est la mort dans l'âme, mais le cœur gonflé de fierté, que nous avons confié notre plus précieux trésor au vizir. Car c'est ainsi que l'on honore l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: « Six mois plus tard, nous avons eu des jumeaux. Un garçon et une fille aux yeux plus sombres que les ténèbres elles-mêmes. » {n}Xioni adresse à Kibellah un sourire empreint de tendresse.{/n} « Tu es née la première, Naaki. Et c'est la mort dans l'âme, mais le cœur gonflé de fierté, que nous avons confié notre plus précieux trésor au vizir. Car c'est ainsi que l'on honore l'Empereur-Dieu. »

languages.text: «Tuvimos mellizos seis meses después. Un niño y una niña con los ojos más oscuros que he visto nunca». {n}Xioni sonríe con ternura a Kibellah.{/n} «Tú naciste primero, Naaki. Con orgullo pero angustia, le entregamos al Visir nuestro más preciado tesoro. Así se debe honrar al Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «Tuvimos mellizos seis meses después. Un niño y una niña con los ojos más oscuros que he visto nunca». {n}Xioni sonríe con ternura a Kibellah.{/n} «Tú naciste primero, Naaki. Con orgullo pero angustia, le entregamos al Visir nuestro más preciado tesoro. Así se debe honrar al Dios Emperador».

languages.text: 「半年後、双子が生まれました。暗闇よりも暗い目をした男の子と女の子です」{n}シオニはキベラに優しく微笑みかける。{/n}「先に生まれたのはあなただったわ、ナアキ。そして悲しみと誇りを胸に、私達はヴィジールに一番大切な宝物を渡した。それが神帝陛下を称える方法だったの」
languages.original_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「半年後、双子が生まれました。暗闇よりも暗い目をした男の子と女の子です」{n}シオニはキベラに優しく微笑みかける。{/n}「先に生まれたのはあなただったわ、ナアキ。そして悲しみと誇りを胸に、私達はヴィジールに一番大切な宝物を渡した。それが神帝陛下を称える方法だったの」

languages.text: “在那之后过了六个月，我们生下了一对双胞胎：一个男孩、一个女孩。他们的黑眼睛比黑暗本身还要更黑。”{n}肖妮对绮贝菈露出了温柔的笑容。{/n}“先诞生的是你，拿基。我们满心悲伤与光荣，把我们最珍贵的宝物交给了宿老，因为这就是侍奉神皇的方式。”
languages.original_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “在那之后过了六个月，我们生下了一对双胞胎：一个男孩、一个女孩。他们的黑眼睛比黑暗本身还要更黑。”{n}肖妮对绮贝菈露出了温柔的笑容。{/n}“先诞生的是你，拿基。我们满心悲伤与光荣，把我们最珍贵的宝物交给了宿老，因为这就是侍奉神皇的方式。”

languages.text: "Sechs Monate später haben wir Zwillinge bekommen. Einen Jungen und ein Mädchen mit Augen dunkler als die Dunkelheit selbst." {n}Xioni lächelt Kibellah liebevoll an.{/n} "Ihr wurdet zuerst geboren, Naaki. Und voller Trauer und Stolz gaben wir dem Wesir unseren wertvollsten Schatz. Denn so ehrt man den Gottimperator."
languages.original_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Sechs Monate später haben wir Zwillinge bekommen. Einen Jungen und ein Mädchen mit Augen dunkler als die Dunkelheit selbst." {n}Xioni lächelt Kibellah liebevoll an.{/n} "Ihr wurdet zuerst geboren, Naaki. Und voller Trauer und Stolz gaben wir dem Wesir unseren wertvollsten Schatz. Denn so ehrt man den Gottimperator."

languages.text: "Altı ay sonra ikizlerimiz oldu. Bir oğlumuz, bir de karanlıktan bile kara gözleri olan bir kızımız oldu." {n}Xioni, Kibellah'ya sevgiyle gülümsüyor.{/n} "İlk doğan sendin Naaki. Hem keder hem de gururla Vezir'e en kıymetli hazinemizi verdik. Zira Tanrı İmparator'u böyle onurlandırırsın."
languages.original_text: "Six months later, we had twins. A boy and a girl with eyes darker than darkness itself." {n}Xioni smiles tenderly at Kibellah.{/n} "You were born first, Naaki. And with sorrow and pride, we gave the Vizsier our most precious treasure. For that is how one honours the God-Emperor."
